info.+content: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

With a Liberation Movement rising in the background, the students are put under more pressure to grow their powers. A team-based competition is arranged between Class A and B at the Hero Academy. We learn more about Endeavour and the tensions in the Todoroki family, along with changes in the One for All power. The season ends with a villain-focused arc as they also grow in strength.
#2: "Uso ja nai" (嘘じゃない) by Soushi Sakiyama
TVアニメ『僕のヒーローアカデミア』

title.+content: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
The New Power and All for One
More of a Hero Than Anyone
